testcase.title: Check the display of error message on Basic search page for ALL fields (when NEAR or SAME operators are used)

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "Web of Science Core Collection"
I select search "Basic Search"

substeps.message: First selected option for dropDown Search Fields (row 1) is defined.
dropDown Search Fields (row 1)  All Fields option is selected.
Text of textInput Search Term (row 0) is .
Text of textInput Search Term (row 0) is Indian SAME Constitution.
textInput Search Term (row 0)  'Indian SAME Constitution' text was entered.

steps.title: I enter the search Term "Indian SAME Constitution" with the field "All Fields"

substeps.message: The appropriate error message The SAME and NEAR search operators are not supported in the All Fields search field. If you need to search for either of those words, please place in quotes (e.g., “near” field scanning). is displayed

steps.title: I check that error message "The SAME and NEAR search operators are not supported in the All Fields search field. If you need to search for either of those words, please place in quotes (e.g., “near” field scanning)." is displayed on "Basic search" page

steps.title: I select collection "Web of Science Core Collection"
I select search "Advanced Search"

substeps.message: The ALL fields tag is displayed on Advanced search page

testcase.title: verify that the query is present in the Advanced Search Page after page navigation

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "Web of Science Core Collection"
I select search "Advanced Search"

substeps.message: Text of textInput Search Term is .
Text of textInput Search Term is ALL=Smith.
textInput Search Term  'ALL=Smith' text was entered.

steps.title: I enter the query "ALL=Smith" on page "Advanced search"
I select search "Basic search"
I select search "Advanced Search"

substeps.message: Text of textInput Search Term is ALL=Smith.
The query : ALL=Smith is present in the Advanced search page after page navigation

steps.title: I verify that the query "ALL=Smith" is present on page "Advanced search"
